text: الا ءال لوط انا لمنجوهم اجمعين

translations.translation: with the exception of the family of Lut, all of whom We will save,
Except the family of Lot whom we shall save
excepting the household of Lot. We shall deliver all of them,
Only the family of Lot will all be saved,
“Except the family of Lut; we shall rescue all of them.”
(All) except the family of Lut, all of whom we are to save (from the destruction)."
Except Lut's followers: We will most surely deliver them all,
excepting the folk of Lot; them we shall deliver
(All) save the family of Lot. Them we shall deliver every one,
Except for Lot's household, all of whom we shall rescue,
All except the household of Lut; surely we are going to deliver all of them.
[who shall perish] except the family of Lot. We will indeed deliver all of them,
Excepting the adherents of Lut: them we are certainly (charged) to save (from harm),- All -
(All) except the family of Lout (Lot). Them all we are surely going to save (from destruction).
Except Lot's family, of whom we shall save all,
“Except for the family of Lot; we will save them all.”
Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all
[15:59] [all] except the family of Lot; indeed we shall save them, all of them, because of their faith,
((All) save the family of Lot) his daughters Za'ura and Raytha and his righteous wife [who was one of his wives]. (Them we shall deliver everyone) from destruction, 277

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِلاَّ آلَ لُوطٍ } أي: أهل بيته، ومن آمن له { إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ } [الحجر: 59] لكونهم معصومين مطيعين

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
ثم أجابوه: { قالوا إنا أرسلنا إلى قوم مجرمين } يعني: قوم لوط لأن شأنهم الإجرام بفعل الفاحشة، { إلا آل لوطٍ } أي: لكن آل لوط لم نُرْسَل إلى عذابهم إذ ليسوا مجرمين: أو أرسلنا إلى قوم أجرموا كلهم، إلا آل لوط، لنهلك المجرمين وننجي آل لوط، ويدل عليه قوله: { إنا لمنجُّوهم أجمعين } من العذاب الذي يهلك به قوم لوط
 قال ابن جزي: قوله: { إلا آل لوط }: يحتمل أن يكون استثناء من قومه، فيكون منقطعاً لوصف القوم بالإجرام، ولم يكن آل لوط مجرمين
